snippet: A proposed settlement to resolve years of legal wrangling over a landmark public pension system overhaul was approved Tuesday by a judge who called it an imperfect but fair solution.
abstract: Rhode Island Superior Court Judge Sarah Taft-Carter approves settlement that will end legal battle over state's public pension system overhaul.
lead_paragraph: A proposed settlement to resolve years of legal wrangling over a landmark public pension system overhaul was approved Tuesday by a judge who called it an imperfect but fair solution.

headline.main: Rhode Island: State Pension Settlement Is Approved
headline.print_headline: Rhode Island: State Pension Settlement Is Approved
